item.title: By: chaospandion
item.dc:creator: chaospandion
item.content:encoded:
chrissie1 – Is it on nuget yet? Do you want us to setup a dedicated forum for it?
Looks cool.

I wouldn’t be against a dedicated forum but I’m not sure how popular it would be.

chrissie1 – Do you have a twitter account?

I don’t currently have an account.

kermit – Awesome, I wouldn’t even know where to begin if I was to do something similar. Get some more articles up for this

That is exactly what I thought until I actually started the project. ðŸ™‚

item.content:encoded:
Awesome, I wouldn’t even know where to begin if I was to do something similar.

Get some more articles up for this

item.description: Is it on nuget yet? Do you want us to setup a dedicated forum for it?<br /> Looks cool.
item.content:encoded:
Is it on nuget yet? Do you want us to setup a dedicated forum for it?
Looks cool.

item.title: By: chaospandion
item.dc:creator: chaospandion
item.description: @Thom - Hey, thanks for the kind words. As to your question, my goal is to make it a cinch to embed Machete into anything. I'm thinking it will be optionally sandboxable but nothing is set in stone.
item.content:encoded: @Thom – Hey, thanks for the kind words. As to your question, my goal is to make it a cinch to embed Machete into anything. I’m thinking it will be optionally sandboxable but nothing is set in stone.

item.title: By: Thom
item.dc:creator: Thom
item.content:encoded:
Looks excellent, and very thorough.

Is the emphasis on a full scripting environment for .NET, or is the engine also embeddable (and potentially sandboxable)?
